actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat certain publicly-traded debt issued or guaranteed by Federal, State, or local governments as qualified nonrecourse financing.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to qualify certain publicly-traded debt as qualified nonrecourse financing for purposes of tax rules limiting tax deductions to amounts considered at risk.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat certain publicly-traded debt issued or guaranteed by Federal, State, or local governments as qualified nonrecourse financing.
